# Draft:Telugu Warriors

Telugu Warriors is an Indian celebrity cricket team based in Hyderabad, competing in the Celebrity Cricket League (CCL) representing Telugu cinema. The team is made up of celebrities from the Indian film industry. It plays its home matches at Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium.
History
The Telugu Warriors franchise was established in 2011, and has since been a participant in the Celebrity Cricket League. It consists of actors, directors, producers, and other personalities from the Telugu film industry.
The Telugu Warriors are one of the most successful teams in the Celebrity Cricket League (CCL).The team has won the CCL championship four times, securing titles in 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2023. Their remarkable hat-trick of victories from 2015 to 2017 established them as a dominant force in the leagueâ€™s history. In addition to their championship triumphs, the Telugu Warriors also finished as runners-up once, in 2013, showcasing their continued competitive presence since the early seasons of the tournament.
